doc.name: is among the keys of

syntax.example: valueToFind is among the keys of arrayToSearch

operator.tag: is not among the keys of

references.operator: is not among the keys of Operator

doc.summary: Evaluates to true if the valueToFind is an element name in the arrayToSearch.

examples.example:
local tArray
put "World" into tArray["Hello"]
"Hello" is among the keys of tArray -- evaluates to true

if "text" is among the keys of the dragData then
set the text of field "Drag Target" to the dragData["text"]
end if

description.p: Is among the keys of should be used to check whether an array contains an element of a specified name.
The valueToFind is a string or an expression that evaluates to a string.
